scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --names "Jekyll,Tailwindcss" "cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload" "tailwind -i assets/scss/index.scss -o assets/css/style.css --watch"
scripts.build: tailwind -i assets/scss/index.scss -o assets/css/style.css && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build:production: tailwind -i assets/scss/index.scss -o assets/css/style.css && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
